sentences.en: A volcano spouts flame and lava.
Few people have been harmed physically by molten lava flowing from volcanoes.
sentences.cn: 被火山喷溢出的熔岩伤身体的人不多.

sentences.en: Fiery red lava streamed down the side and into the water.
sentences.cn: 火红的溶岩顺山坡流入水中.

sentences.en: His anger spilled out like lava.
sentences.cn: 他的愤怒像火山爆发似的迸发出来.

sentences.en: Lava boiled up from the crater of the volcano.
sentences.cn: 熔岩从火山口里滚滚喷出.

sentences.en: Lava is extruded from the volcano.
Mexico's Mount Colima began spewing lava and ash last night.
sentences.cn: 墨西哥科利马山昨晚开始喷发熔岩和火山灰。

sentences.en: The city was entombed in volcanic lava.
The ground had opened to disgorge a boiling stream of molten lava.
sentences.cn: 大地开裂，汩汩冒出炽热的熔岩。

sentences.en: The lava flowed down the sides of the volcano.
sentences.cn: 熔岩沿火山坡面涌流而下.

sentences.en: The lava will just ooze gently out of the crater.
sentences.cn: 岩浆就会从火山口缓缓涌流出来。

sentences.en: The volcano was spurting out rivers of molten lava.
This is an active volcano which spews out lava every year.
sentences.cn: 这是个每年喷熔岩的活火山.

trans.tran_en: hot liquid rock that flows from a volcano,or this rock when it has become solid
